response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might pay. Considering its worth to us and its potential value to you, I propose a price of $100 for this product. This offer allows you to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable price, while also ensuring we receive a fair compensation for our efforts and resources invested into creating it. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.", "product_price": 100}
